title: Silence
brief_description: An outstanding drama about an autistic boy, Eric, who gets lost in the woods during a camping trip with his foster parents. Academy award winning director, John Korty, sensitively explores the new world Eric has discovered … a wilderness inhabited by animals who demonstrate an affection the boy has rarely received from human beings. Man of the mountains, Crazy Jack, befriends him and is instrumental in re-uniting Eric with his family in an emotion charged ending.
